edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pocketpc.model
Class ModelPeer

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pocketpc.model.ModelPeer
public class ModelPeer
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a peer in the model. We mix the model with its presenta- tion in order to facilitate the management of the model information and its presentation.

Author:
rsilvafi class created at Aug 3, 2005
